missions.name: Influence Mission
missions.value:
[INF] in {systemname} | Wolves of Jonai command would like to increase our [b]Influence[/b] in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System.

To achieve this goal Command recommends:
[ul]
[li]Complete missions for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Complete passenger contracts for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Hand in Bounties Vouchers for the Wolves of Jonai at any Station in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Conduct profitable trade at any Wolves of Jonai owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[li]Sell exploration data to any Wolves of Jonai owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[/ul]

Select the [b]“Influence”[/b] mission reward whenever possible.

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]

missions.name: Election Mission
missions.value:
[ELE] in {systemname} | We have an [b]Election[/b] in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] Support the Wolves of Jonai in this Election!

To achieve this goal Command recommends:
[ul]
[li]Complete missions for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Complete passenger contracts for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System[/li]
[li]Conduct profitable trade at Wolves Of Jonai owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[li]Sell exploration data to Wolves Of Jonai owned Stations in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b][/li]
[/ul]

Select the [b]“influence”[/b] mission reward whenever possible.

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]

missions.name: War Mission
missions.value:
[WAR] in {systemname} | We have [b]War[/b] in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b]! Help the Wolves of Jonai to win.

To win this war in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b], Command would like you to do the following:

[ul]
[li]Do Massacre missions for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Do Wartime and Strategic missions for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Successfully complete combat zone scenarios for the Wolves of Jonai in the [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b] System;[/li]
[li]Hand in Wolves of Jonai Combat Bonds from the Combat Zones to any Station in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b];[/li]
[li]Hand in Wolves of Jonai Bounty Vouchers to any Station in [b][url=https://inara.cz/elite/starsystem/?search={systemname}]{systemname}[/url][/b]. [/li]
[/ul]

If you wish to know where the current Conflicts are at, you can find out the scores on discord or located at this page [url=https://inara.cz/elite/minorfaction-conflicts/31555/]Wolves Of Jonai Conflicts[/url] (Just click the filter called: [b]Just faction conflicts[/b])

If you have [b]any[/b] questions about the mission, you can ask us in the BGS-Redwolves channel on Discord.
Join the Wolves of Jonai Community Discord:
[url=http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5]http://discord.gg/6CzTtP5[/url]
